about_the_game:
Freckles! These cute little creatures live on the planet Mercury. On a mission to Earth, the freckles collide with Earth's space debris. After the crash, they find themselves in the backyard of a greedy family who wants to exploit them. Help the freckles escape by finding their remaining friends and repairing their spaceship.

A unique Story with Mystery Elements

Puzzle and Exploration RPG

Challenging Riddles

Inventory System

Collectables and Sidequets

We have decided to change the design of the Freckles characters. The change will be made with the next update. The demo will also receive general improvements.

What kind of a game is this?

Freckles is a puzzle and exploration RPG with an inventory system. Find tools, objects, consumables, keys and use them to unlock doors, overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. The game focuses on story and puzzling, it's combat-free.

What is a cool feature of the game?

You have to free your Freckles friends and repair the spaceship. Also a sidequest where you have to collect stuff awaits you.

Where does the game take place?

The game takes place in the premises of the family Dinsmore.
